import React, { Component } from "react"; class FormDetail extends Component { state = { form:{} } componentDidMount() { if(this.props.location.state){ this.setState({ form:this.props.location.state }) } } inputChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value); } render() { console.log(this.state) let form = this.state.form; console.log(form.fields) return (
{this.inputChangeHandler(event)}} />
{this.inputChangeHandler(event)}}/>
{this.inputChangeHandler(event)}}/>
{this.inputChangeHandler(event)}}/>
{this.inputChangeHandler(event)}}/>
) } } export default FormDetail;
